question: 1. What is the time complexity of accessing an element in an array?
2. Which data structure best represents an array?
3. What is the index of the first element in an array?
options: c) Depends on the programming language

question: 4. What is the maximum number of elements that can be stored in an array?
options: a) Depends on the available memory
b) Limited by the size of the data type used

question: 5. Which operation on arrays is not constant time?
options: a) Accessing an element by index
b) Assigning a value to an element by index
c) Removing an element from the middle of the array
d) Adding an element to the end of the array

question: 6. What is the memory allocation of a two-dimensional array?
7. Which of the following operations on arrays is generally slow?
options: a) Accessing an element by index
b) Assigning a value to an element by index

question: 8. What is the time complexity of searching for an element in an unsorted array?
9. Which operation on arrays involves shifting elements?
options: a) Accessing an element by index
b) Assigning a value to an element by index
c) Removing an element from the end of the array
d) Removing an element from the middle of the array

question: 10. Which data structure is similar to a dynamic array?
